scripts.js:dev: npm run babel && npm run browserify && mv ./dist/js/main.bundle.js ./dist/js/main.min.js && npm run cleanup
scripts.js:prod: npm run babel && npm run browserify && npm run terser && npm run cleanup
scripts.prebuild: npm run deletedist && npm run mkdirs
scripts.build:prod: npm run prebuild && npm run js:prod && npm run css:prod && cp -R ./assets/img ./dist && cp -R ./assets/fonts ./dist && cp -R ./assets/favicon ./dist
scripts.build:dev: npm run prebuild && npm run js:dev && npm run css:dev && cp -R ./assets/img ./dist && cp -R ./assets/fonts ./dist && cp -R ./assets/favicon ./dist
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.start: npm run build:dev && parallelshell 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch'
